entity.description: The 'Abort SnapMirror' command stops ongoing transfers for a SnapMirror/SnapVault relationship. The relationship is identified by its destination endpoint.
entity.name: Abort SnapMirror - copy

entity.description: The 'Abort SnapMirror' workflow stops ongoing transfers for a SnapMirror or SnapVault relationship. The relationship is identified by its destination endpoint.
entity.name: Abort SnapMirror relationship Copy- Test
